text: The 2011–12 Austrian Cup the 67th season of Austria's nationwide cup competition in Austrian football. SV Ried were the defending champions. ==Round dates== The competition was held as follows.http://www.austriasoccer.at Round Match date Round 1 5–7 August 2011 Round 2 20–21 September 2011 Round of 16 25–26 October 2011 Quarter-finals 10–11 April 2012 Semi-finals 1-2 May 2012 Final 20 May 2022 == Round 1 == First round with teams from the first and second league. ==Round of 32== ==Round of 16== ==Quarter-finals== ==Semi-finals== ==Final== ==Top goalscorers== Rank Player Club Goals 1 Hamdi Salihi SK Rapid Wien 8 2 Guillem Marti Misut SV Ried 5 3 Philipp Hosiner FC Admira Wacker Mödling 4 3 Gerald Krajic SC Austria Lustenau 4 3 Daniel Krenn Red Bull Juniors 4 Weltfußball.de Torschützen (German) ==References== Category:Austrian Cup Category:2012 in association football Category:2012 in Austria
title: 2011–12 Austrian Cup
